response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. Given its exceptional value and unique features, I understand its worth to you is estimated at $1,500,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a strategic price of $1,250,000, aiming to create a mutually beneficial arrangement.

This offer represents a significant saving compared to the market value, while still allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of the investment we've made into developing this product. I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations, contributing to your company's success in a meaningful way.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product or the offer. I am here to provide you with all the necessary information to make an informed decision.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
